long_description: This rugged Novara Ponderosa 24 in. mountain bike lets kids and smaller adults ride singletrack with an appropriately sized frame. Strong 6061 aluminum frame is double-butted (thick at the ends, narrow toward the middle) for weight savings that do not compromise strength. Spinner Grind 1 AL suspension fork delivers 63mm of travel to take the edge off rough trail features. SRAM components and twist shifters dole out 21 gears, offering plenty of options for hill climbing or flat-land speed. SRAM 3.0 derailleurs offer a great balance of durability and function. Tektro linear-pull brakes provide fast and reliable stopping power. Wellgo platform pedals are durable and lugged to grip the rider's shoes. Velo Junior saddle comfortably fits small frames. Specs on the Novara Ponderosa 24 in. mountain bike are subject to change.
